description: The IN3 segment contains additional insurance information for certifying the need for patient care. Fields used by this segment are defined by HCFA, or other regulatory agencies.

1.name: Set ID - Insurance Certification
1.description: IN3-1-set ID contains the number that identifies this transaction. For the first occurrence of the segment the sequence number shall be 1, for the second occurrence it shall be 2, etc.

10.name: Certification End Date
10.description: This field contains date that this certification ends.

11.name: Days
11.description: This field contains the number of days for which this certification is valid. This field applies to denied, pending, or approved days. Refer to user-defined table 0149 - Day type for suggested values

12.name: Non-Concur Code/Description
12.description: This field contains the non-concur code and description for a denied request. Refer to userdefined table 0233 - Non-concur code/description for suggested values

13.name: Non-Concur Effective Date/Time
13.description: This field contains the effective date of the non-concurrence classification

14.name: Physician Reviewer
14.description: This field contains the physician who works with and reviews cases that are pending physician review for the certification agency. Multiple names for the same person may be sent in this sequence. The legal name is assumed to be in the first repetition. When the legal name is not sent, a repeat delimiter must be sent first for the first repetition.
14.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

15.name: Certification Contact
15.description: This field contains the name of the party contacted at the certification agency who granted the certification and communicated the certification number

16.name: Certification Contact Phone Number
16.description: This field contains the phone number of the certification contact. Multiple phone numbers for the same certification contact may be sent in this sequence. The primary phone number is assumed to be in the first repetition. When the primary telephone number is not sent, a repeat delimiter must be sent first for the first repetition

17.name: Appeal Reason
17.description: This field contains the reason that an appeal was made on a non-concur for certification

18.name: Certification Agency
18.description: This field contains the certification agency

19.name: Certification Agency Phone Number
19.description: This field contains the phone number of the certification agency.

2.name: Certification Number
2.description: This field contains the number assigned by the certification agency.
2.data_type: CX - Extended Composite ID With Check Digit

20.name: Pre-Certification required/Window
20.description:
This field indicates whether pre-certification is required for particular patient types, and the time window for obtaining the certification. The following components of this field are defined as follows:

- pre-certification patient type refers to user-defined table 0150 - Pre-certification patient type for suggested values
- pre-certification required refers to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values
- pre-certification window is the amount of time required to attain certification from arrival at the institution. Its format follows the time stamp (TS) data type rules

21.name: Case Manager
21.description: This field contains the name of the entity who/which is handling this particular patient’s case (e.g., UR nurse, or a specific facility location).

22.name: Second Opinion Date
22.description: This field contains the date that the second opinion was obtained.

23.name: Second Opinion Status
23.description: This field contains the code that represents the status of the second opinion. Refer to userdefined table 0151 - Second opinion status for suggested values.
23.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

24.name: Second Opinion Documentation Received
24.description: Use this field if accompanying documentation has been received by the provider. Refer to userdefined table 0152 - Second opinion documentation received for suggested values.
24.data_type: IS - Coded value for user-defined tables

25.name: Second Opinion Physician
25.description: This field contains an identifier and name of the physician who provided the second opinion. Multiple names and identifiers for the same person may be sent in this sequence. The legal name is assumed to be in the first repetition. When the legal name is not sent, a repeat delimiter must be sent first for the first repetition.
25.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

3.name: Certified By
3.description: This field contains the party that approved the certification. Multiple names and identifiers for the same person may be sent in this sequence. The legal name is assumed to be in the first repetition. When the legal name is not sent, a repeat delimiter must be sent first for the first repetition.
3.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

4.name: Certification Required
4.description: This field indicates whether certification is required. Refer to HL7 table 0136 - Yes/no indicator for valid values
4.data_type: ID - Coded values for HL7 tables

5.name: Penalty
5.description: This field contains the penalty, in dollars or a percentage, that will be assessed if the precertification is not performed. Refer to user-defined table 0148 - Penalty type for suggested values

6.name: Certification Date/Time
6.description: This field contains the date and time stamp that indicates when insurance was certified to exist for the patient.

7.name: Certification Modify Date/Time
7.description: This field contains the date/time that the certification was modified

8.name: Operator
8.description: This field contains the name party who is responsible for sending this certification information. Multiple names for the same person may be sent in this sequence. The legal name is assumed to be in the first repetition. When the legal name is not sent, a repeat delimiter must be sent first for the first repetition.
8.data_type: XCN - Extended Composite ID Number And Name

9.name: Certification Begin Date
9.description: This field contains the date that this certification begins
